remarks: Comparable spans of singletons must have proportional vectors.  See ~ lspsneq for equal span version.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lspsnss2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnss2.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lspsnss2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` S ) $.
lspsnss2.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lspsnss2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnss2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspsnss2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspsnss2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspsnss2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` { X } ) C_ ( N ` { Y } ) <-> E. k e. K X = ( k .x. Y ) ) ) $.
$d .x. k $.
$d K k $.
$d N k $.
$d S k $.
$d V k $.
$d W k $.
$d X k $.
$d Y k $.
